thread.title: Strike action at Stansted Airport
thread.title_full: Strike action at Stansted Airport | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Strike action at Stansted Airport
text:
Stansted airport. Credit: ITV Anglia Staff at Stansted Airport who operate security scanners for checked in luggage will take further strike action this weekend.
Around 30 employees are expected to walk out between 3.45am tomorrow and 1.45pm on Sunday over pay.
These members also took strike action in August and September.
Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Travel Stansted Airport Essex
